content.body: has anyone proposed overloading `setTimeout` and friends to accept `Temporal.Duration` objects? I want to write `setTimeout(Temporal.Duration.from({ minutes: 10 }))`
content.formatted_body: has anyone proposed overloading setTimeout and friends to accept Temporal.Duration objects? I want to write setTimeout(Temporal.Duration.from({ minutes: 10 }))

content.body: I guess I could do `setTimeout(Temporal.Duration.from({ minutes: 10 }).total('milliseconds'))` already
content.formatted_body: I guess I could do setTimeout(Temporal.Duration.from({ minutes: 10 }).total('milliseconds')) already

content.body: really what I want is to overload it to take anything coercible to a `Temporal.Duration` so I could just write `setTimeout({ minutes: 10 })` directly
content.formatted_body: really what I want is to overload it to take anything coercible to a Temporal.Duration so I could just write setTimeout({ minutes: 10 }) directly
